access_token_expiration.name: access_token_expiration
access_token_expiration.description: Defines the access token expiration in seconds

active_session_timeout.name: active_session_timeout
active_session_timeout.description: Specify how long (seconds) a user is allowed to work continuosly in the account

allowed_ip_addresses_continuous_delivery.name: allowed_ip_addresses_continuous_delivery
allowed_ip_addresses_continuous_delivery.description: Continuous Delivery IP addresses/ranges in list

allowed_ip_addresses_iks_activity_tracke.name: allowed_ip_addresses_iks_activity_tracker_ldna
allowed_ip_addresses_iks_activity_tracke.description: Activity Tracker (LogDNA) IP addresses/ranges in list

allowed_ip_addresses_iks_container_regis.name: allowed_ip_addresses_iks_container_registry
allowed_ip_addresses_iks_container_regis.description: Container Registry IP addresses/ranges in list

allowed_ip_addresses_iks_control_plane_f.name: allowed_ip_addresses_iks_control_plane_fw
allowed_ip_addresses_iks_control_plane_f.description: IKS' Control Plane IP addresses/ranges in list

allowed_ip_addresses_iks_sysdig_monitori.name: allowed_ip_addresses_iks_sysdig_monitoring
allowed_ip_addresses_iks_sysdig_monitori.description: Cloud Monitoring (Sysdig) IP addresses/ranges in list

allowed_ip_schematics_eu_central.name: allowed_ip_schematics_eu_central
allowed_ip_schematics_eu_central.description: Schematics EU IP addresses/ranges in list

allowed_ip_schematics_uk_south.name: allowed_ip_schematics_uk_south
allowed_ip_schematics_uk_south.description: Schematics UK South IP addresses/ranges in list

allowed_ip_schematics_us.name: allowed_ip_schematics_us
allowed_ip_schematics_us.description: Schematics US IP addresses/ranges in list

api_creation.name: api_creation
api_creation.description: When restriction is enabled, users in your account require specific access to create API keys, including the account owner

custom_allowed_ip_addresses.name: custom_allowed_ip_addresses
custom_allowed_ip_addresses.description: Specify a custom list of IPv4/IPv6 addresses/subnets that have access to the account, separate multiple values with a comma

enforce_allowed_ip_addresses.name: enforce_allowed_ip_addresses
enforce_allowed_ip_addresses.description: If true IP address restriction will be enforced, If false, traffic originated outside specified allowed IP address set is monitored with audit events sent to SIEM and Activity Tracker.   After running in monitored mode to test this variable should explicity be set to true to enfoce IP allow listing

ignore_ibm_approved_ip_addresses.name: ignore_ibm_approved_ip_addresses
ignore_ibm_approved_ip_addresses.description: If true IP address control will only be evaluate custom_allowed_ip_addresses, If false, restricion will be consider both IBM approved IP sets and custom_allowed_ip_addresses (if configured)

inactive_session_timeout.name: inactive_session_timeout
inactive_session_timeout.description: Specify how long (seconds) a user is allowed to stay logged in the account while being inactive/idle

mfa.name: mfa
mfa.description: Specify Multi-Factor Authentication method in the account
mfa.options: NONE, TOTP, TOTP4ALL, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3

public_access_enabled.name: public_access_enabled
public_access_enabled.description: Enable/Disable public access group in which resources are open anyone regardless if they are member of your account or not

refresh_token_expiration.name: refresh_token_expiration
refresh_token_expiration.description: Defines the refresh token expiration in seconds

serviceid_creation.name: serviceid_creation
serviceid_creation.description: When restriction is enabled, users in your account require specific access to create service IDs, including the account owner

shell_settings_enabled.name: shell_settings_enabled
shell_settings_enabled.description: Enable global shell settings to all users in the account

account_allowed_ip_addresses_control_mod.name: account_allowed_ip_addresses_control_mode
account_allowed_ip_addresses_control_mod.description: Current allowed IP addresses enforcement control mode, will indicate RESTRICT if account_allowed_ip_addresses_enforced is TRUE

account_allowed_ip_addresses_enforced.name: enforce_allowed_ip_addresses
account_allowed_ip_addresses_enforced.description: If true IP address restriction will be enforced, If false, traffic originated outside specified allowed IP address set is monitored with audit events sent to SIEM and Activity Tracker.   After running in monitored mode to test this variable should explicity be set to true to enfoce IP allow listing

account_approved_ibm_ip_addresses_ignore.name: ignore_ibm_approved_ip_addresses
account_approved_ibm_ip_addresses_ignore.description: If true IP address control will only be evaluate custom_allowed_ip_addresses, If false, restricion will be consider both IBM approved IP sets and custom_allowed_ip_addresses (if configured)

account_iam_apikey_creation.name: account_iam_apikey_creation
account_iam_apikey_creation.description: Current state of API key creation restriction

account_iam_serviceid_creation.name: account_iam_serviceid_creation
account_iam_serviceid_creation.description: Current state of ServiceID creation restriction

account_public_access.name: account_public_access
account_public_access.description: Current state of public access group setting

account_shell_settings_status.name: account_shell_settings_status
account_shell_settings_status.description: Current state of global shell setting
